On Fri, Oct 31, 2008 at 12:39 PM, Charlie Poole
<charlie@...> wrote:
> Personally, I'd just use multiple tests or two theories - one for
> in-bounds and one for out-of bounds indices.

Agreed.

> But if one were adamant about having a single test, it's
> possible to create an assertThrows that takes a class as
> argument, essentially simulating delegates.

I've done so in JUnit, by the way:

http://shareandenjoy.saff.net/2006/12/assertthrownexception_20.html

   David Saff
